response.overview: This entertaining collection of 70-plus theatrical trailers for movies produced by Troma — a studio synonymous with gratuitous nudity, outrageously campy horror and more — assembles previews of such cinematic masterpieces as The Toxic Avenger. Additional trailers include Bloodsucking Freaks, Class of Nuke’ Em High and Sgt. Kabukiman, N.Y.P.D. which features the famous exploding blue car used in countless subsequent productions!
response.title: Coming Distractions
